name: Coconut Amino Garlic Broccoli
description: This Coconut Amino Garlic Broccoli is a delightful dish for anyone looking to enjoy a low-carb, low-sodium, and low-sugar meal. Perfect for those seeking healthy, healthified recipes that don't compromise on flavor.

recipeInstructions.text: Wash the broccoli under cold water and cut into florets.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 1

recipeInstructions.text: In a pan, heat the olive oil over medium heat and sauté the minced garlic until fragrant, about 2 minutes.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 3

recipeInstructions.text: Add the broccoli florets to the pan and sauté for 5 minutes.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 4

recipeInstructions.text: Pour the coconut aminos over the broccoli, stir well, and cook for another 5 minutes until the broccoli is tender but still crisp.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 5
